english.segment1: Doesnt matter what people sayI forget their watching eyes. I just want to bring to You. My most costly, my most priceless, my most precious Sacrifice
english.segment2: Extravagant worship. Total surrender. Reckless abandon. I pour out my love, pour out myself. Saviour. Breaking open my thankful heart I release its praise perfume. Here Ill linger lifting to You. Songs of wonder, songs of worship Songs of deepest gratitude
